submission:
class Solution:
    def shortestDistanceAfterQueries(self, n: int, queries: List[List[int]]) -> List[int]:
        curr = n - 1
        ans = []
        nx = [i + 1 for i in range(n)]
        skp = [False] * n
        for u, v in queries:
            old_dis = 0
            if skp[u] or skp[v]:
                ans.append(curr)
                continue
            node = u
            while True:
                node = nx[node]
                # print(node, v)
                if node == v:
                    break
                skp[node] = True
                old_dis += 1
            # print(old_dis)
            nx[u] = v
            curr -= old_dis
            ans.append(curr)
        return ans
